casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Zachary David THOMSEN. No. 308A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 7, 2016. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Southern Pines, for Thomsen, Zachary David. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Maureen Krueger, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 7th of January 2016 by State of NC:

*469"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of January 2016."
